Label: sustainability
Classified Text: ['Ensuring our success in this competition takes place in harmony with economics and ecology.', 'We combine economic success with social responsibility and environ mental protection.', 'Ivoclar Vivadent undertakes to meet all applicable laws and regulations govern ing the protection of occupational health and the environment as minimum standards and to avoid environmental harm and risks to the health and safety of its employees.', 'The resources necessary to achieve this will be reliably pro vided.', 'We rely on farsighted and sustainable concepts and we are aware of our re sponsibility for future generations.', 'Environmental protection begins the mo ment we develop a new product and procure raw, auxiliary and operating ma terials.', 'We also aim at preventing negative effects on the environment in our sourcing, shipping and manufacturing processes.', 'Our values and standards are centered on the wellbeing of our employees and the vision of an intact environment.', 'Effective communication with our staff en sures that the essential requirements are met to achieve efficient economic processes and a high level of safety, sustainability and resource efficiency.', 'Our managers play a key role in attaining this.', 'Fostering and developing our values and standards is an important matter for Ivoclar Vivadent.', 'We aim to achieve this goal via a process of continuous im provement organization, processes, products always in close collaboration with our customers, suppliers and employees.', 'Diego Gabathuler CEO Markus Heinz CPO Corporate HSE Representative Patrik Oehri Senior Director CQM']
